Class NameValidatorTest

java.lang.Object
NameValidatorTest
public class NameValidatorTest extends Object
Unit tests for the NameValidator class.

This test class ensures that the validateName method functions correctly by verifying valid and invalid name inputs according to defined criteria.

Author:
Dhruv

      public NameValidatorTest()

  • Method Details

    • testEmptyName

      @Test public void testEmptyName()
      Tests the validateName method with an empty name string. Expects an IllegalArgumentException to be thrown.

    • testNullName

      @Test public void testNullName()
      Tests the validateName method with a null name string. Expects an IllegalArgumentException to be thrown.

    • testNameStartsWithNonLetter

      @Test public void testNameStartsWithNonLetter()
      Tests the validateName method with names starting with non-letter characters. Expects an IllegalArgumentException to be thrown for each invalid case.

    • testNameWithInvalidCharacter

      @Test public void testNameWithInvalidCharacter()
      Tests the validateName method with names containing invalid characters. Expects an IllegalArgumentException to be thrown for each invalid case.

    • testValidNames

      @Test public void testValidNames()
      Tests the validateName method with valid names. Ensures no exception is thrown for properly formatted names.
